description: After the fun Trystan had with Jonny Torque a few weeks ago, our boy decided to revist the scene of the crime...the pool table.The cum is dry, and the balls are in different places, but the memory of having his cock services by his slim buddy Jonny really gets his blood flowing. And since his girlfriend is out of town again, it's time to take matter, or his cock, into his own hands.The pool stick isn't the only piece of wood that's on the table today!Enjoy!
title: Pool Table Mischief
